Features

Solutions

COSMATT is available for the Financial Accounting and Servo Engineering.

COSMATT Financial Accounting

COSMATT Financial Accounting is a digital first Courseware and a Set of Problems available as a bundle or separately. The courseware is an online study material which includes interactive spreadsheet-based in-line exercises, real-time feedback and graded assignments. The Problem Sets are a set of individualized spreadsheet-based exercises that can be used for homework assignments or for assessments. All problems are academically-vetted and linked to common learning objectives in many popular introductory financial accounting texts. The questions cover the fundamentals of financial accounting including recording transactions, the accounting cycle, financial statements and investment analysis.
View More

COSMATT Servo Engineering

COSMATT Engineering is a Digital First Servo Sizing E-Learning Course With Advanced Analytical Content. It explains how servo systems work and how to select and optimise electric servo system components. In addition a complementary COSMATT sizing software tool is provided to extend the learning experience with complete sizing exercises.
View More

Advantages of COSMATT Courseware

Dynamic exercises

  • Visual interactive based problems that allow a student to study, manipulate, and evaluate alternative variables and data for design and analytical outcomes.

Integrated content

  • All content is presented inline for students and ties to specific learning objectives to master the course.

Problem Sets

  • Advanced problems tied to largest selling texts associated with the subject matter.

Builder

  • Intuitive authoring and assembly tool to create and manipulate your own content, or make changes to existing problems sets and interactives
